Combat

Armor: Agile Breastplate Shield: Light Steel Quickdraw Weapons: Dagger (+13 d4+2 x2@19 R10'); Heavy Crossbow (+12 d10 x2@19 R120'); Heavy Shield (+13 d4+2 x2@20); Unarmed (+13 d3+2 x2@20)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +36
Deft Shield: Reduces tower shield attack penalty by 1
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Forewarned: +1 Initiative/Always act in surprise round
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Damage Adjustment: +2
Coordinated Defense: +2 CMD (+4 vs. larger foe) when adjacent ally has same feat
Coordinated Maneuvers: +2 CMB, +2 CMD, and +4 vs. grapple when adjacent ally has same feat
Duck And Cover: May use Reflex roll of adjacent ally who has same feat; knocked prone afterward
Lookout: May act in surprise round when adjacent ally has same feat and can act; may take move and standard action if both could normally act
Outflank: +4 flanking attack when ally has same feat; critical hit gives ally AOO
Paired Opportunists: +4 AOO and share ally AOO when ally has same feat and threatens same foe
Phalanx Fighting: May use polearm or spear 1-handed w/shield
Precise Strike: +1d6 HP damage when flanking ally has same feat
Ready Pike: May brace weapon for +2 attack and damage 2/dy
Shield Ally: May use heavy or tower shield move to give self and adjacent allies +2 AC and +1 Reflex for 1 rd
Shield Wall: +1 shielded AC when adjacent ally has same feat and buckler or light shield; +2 w/heavy or tower shield
Stand Firm: +3 CMD vs. bull rush, drag, overrun, trip, and trample
Swap Places: May swap places w/adjacent ally who has same feat; ally suffers no AOO
Save: Fortitude: +10; Reflex: +4; Will: +9
Save Notes:
Constitution Fortitude Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Reflex Adjustment: +1
Wisdom Will Adjustment: +3
Duck And Cover: +2 AC vs. ranged if adjacent ally w/shield has same feat
Heart Of The Fields: May ignore fatigued or exhausted effect 1/dy
Magic
Spell Slots: W0: 4; W1: 4 Spell DC: W: 13
Magic Notes:
Intelligence Wizard Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level W1, W2, W3
School Specialization (Divination): Extra Divination spell/dy each spell level
Allied Spellcaster: +2 to overcome spell resistance when adjacent ally has same feat; +4 and +1 caster level when ally has same spell
Arcane Spell Failure: 30%
Bonded Object: May cast known spell through object
Diviner's Fortune: Touched creature +1 attack, skill, ability, and save for 1 rd 6/dy
School Opposition (Conjuration): Double cost to cast Conjuration spells
School Opposition (Illusion): Double cost to cast Illusion spells
Scribe Scroll: Create scroll of any known spell
Shielded Caster: +4 concentration when adjacent ally has same feat and no shield, +5 w/buckler or light shield, +6 w/heavy or tower shield/Suffer half concentration DC from foe Disruptive or similar feature
Notes
Companion Notes: Eye For Talent: Animal companion, bonded mount, cohort, or familiar gains +2 on choice of ability
Validation Errors: Feat Allocation: 12 available vs. 11 allocated
